resource_warning_unclosed_files.impact: File handles leak in tests (but OS cleans up on process exit)

deferred_fixes.title: Fix ResourceWarning: unclosed file handles in logger tests
deferred_fixes.description: 13 tests create FileHandler objects that aren't explicitly closed, causing ResourceWarning
deferred_fixes.proposed_fix: Add explicit handler.close() in test teardown or refactor setup_logging to use context manager

deferred_fixes.title: Fix Hypothesis decimal precision warnings
deferred_fixes.description: 19 warnings from Hypothesis property tests using float min/max values converted to Decimal
deferred_fixes.proposed_fix: Use Decimal('0.1000') directly in decimals() strategy instead of float conversion
deferred_fixes.acceptance_criteria: Zero Hypothesis deprecation warnings in test output

deferred_fixes.title: Remove format_exc_info processor from structlog chain
deferred_fixes.description: structlog suggests removing format_exc_info when using ConsoleRenderer
deferred_fixes.proposed_fix: Remove structlog.processors.format_exc_info from shared_processors in utils/logger.py
deferred_fixes.acceptance_criteria: Zero structlog UserWarnings in test output

deferred_fixes.title: Convert YAML float literals to string format
deferred_fixes.description: 111 float literals in YAML config files should be strings for safer Decimal conversion
deferred_fixes.proposed_fix: Change float literals (kelly_fraction: 0.25) to strings (kelly_fraction: "0.25") across all 7 YAML files
deferred_fixes.acceptance_criteria: Zero float literal warnings from validate_docs.py

deferred_fixes.acceptance_criteria: Zero 'Document exists but not in index' warnings from validate_docs.py

deferred_fixes.acceptance_criteria: Zero 'Document in index but does not exist' warnings from validate_docs.py

deferred_fixes.title: Document ADR numbering scheme in ARCHITECTURE_DECISIONS
deferred_fixes.description: 231 ADR gap warnings due to intentional non-sequential numbering
deferred_fixes.proposed_fix: Add note to ARCHITECTURE_DECISIONS header explaining ADR numbering scheme and intentional gaps
deferred_fixes.acceptance_criteria: ADR numbering policy documented (warnings remain as informational)

governance_policy.notes: Baseline established 2025-11-08 with warnings from THREE validation systems: (1) pytest test warnings (41), (2) validate_docs.py warnings (388 across 5 categories), (3) code quality (Ruff 0, Mypy 0). Total: 429 warnings. Breakdown: 182 actionable, 231 informational (ADR gaps), 16 expected (coverage, planned docs). No new actionable warnings allowed without explicit approval and baseline update. Multi-source governance enforces zero-regression policy across ALL validation tools.
